CustomField.formula: IF( Tehsil_Name__r.Month_Number__c = 1, Tehsil_Name__r.January_Target__c , IF(Tehsil_Name__r.Month_Number__c = 2, Tehsil_Name__r.February_Target__c , IF(Tehsil_Name__r.Month_Number__c = 3, Tehsil_Name__r.March_Target__c, IF(Tehsil_Name__r.Month_Number__c = 4, Tehsil_Name__r.April_Target__c, IF(Tehsil_Name__r.Month_Number__c = 5, Tehsil_Name__r.May_Target__c, IF(Tehsil_Name__r.Month_Number__c = 6, Tehsil_Name__r.June_Target__c, IF(Tehsil_Name__r.Month_Number__c = 7, Tehsil_Name__r.July_Target__c, IF(Tehsil_Name__r.Month_Number__c = 8, Tehsil_Name__r.August_Target__c, IF(Tehsil_Name__r.Month_Number__c = 9, Tehsil_Name__r.September_Target__c, IF(Tehsil_Name__r.Month_Number__c = 10, Tehsil_Name__r.October_Target__c, IF(Tehsil_Name__r.Month_Number__c = 11, Tehsil_Name__r.November_Target__c, IF(Tehsil_Name__r.Month_Number__c = 12, Tehsil_Name__r.December_Target__c, 0) ) ) ) ) ) ) ) ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Month Target
